static-project-planner.description:
sA project planner for beginners to help them plan out projects step by step. Helps junior developers start projects from scratch, with all things in mind before they even start coding. Focuses on project planning, setup, testing, and design.

A project showcase for beginners to show off their work/projects to recruiters and friends. It helps the developer to really pick out and show the "sparkles" in each and every project.
goals: sCreate an all-in-one platform to plan projects
sBe able to organize and showcase projects
sHave a platform that forces planning beforehand
impacts: sRelieve having to worry about the details
sReduce stress when starting a new project
